com.example.bot.spring

类 Filter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.bot.spring.Filter

  • public class Filter
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Filter can search the tours which fulfill the criteria provided by the users. It can also show the details of a tour to the user.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Filter(java.lang.String ID)
      Constructor of the class Filter.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String filterSearch(java.lang.String keyword)
      This method can take the searching keyword from customer, find tours fulfill the criteria and return the list of the tours.
      java.lang.String viewDetails(java.lang.String keyword)
      This method is used to display the details of the tour which is selected by the customer.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Filter

        public Filter(java.lang.String ID)
        Constructor of the class Filter. It requires the user id of the customer.
        参数:
        ID - This is the user id of the customer

    • 方法详细资料

      • filterSearch

        public java.lang.String filterSearch(java.lang.String keyword)
        This method can take the searching keyword from customer, find tours fulfill the criteria and return the list of the tours.
        参数:
        keyword - This is the searching keyword from the class TextHandler
        返回:
        java.lang.String This returns

      • viewDetails

        public java.lang.String viewDetails(java.lang.String keyword)
        This method is used to display the details of the tour which is selected by the customer.
        参数:
        keyword - This is the customer's selection from the tour list
        返回:
        java.lang.String This returns the details of the tour. If the keyword is not in the list provided previously, this returns null
